answerText: cochlea[10] This portion of the cochlea transduces vibrations in cochlear fluid into action potentials in each of its approximately 20,000 hair cells.

subject: Science
question: Question: In monotremes, this structure is not coiled. For 10 points each: [10] Name this spiral-shaped portion of the inner ear that takes its name from the Latin for "snail shell."
